article_title: How HuffPost's 20,000-Word Heroin Treatment Story Came Together

article_metadata.news_keywords: capital comment, media, health, politics, entertainment, arts, headlines, washington, dc, food, restaurant reviews

og.description: "Dying to Be Free," Jason Cherkis' long-promised story about drug treatment and addiction, appeared in the Huffington Post on January 28. The piece, some 20,000 or so words long (who counts after 19,000?) had been in the works for more...
og.title: How HuffPost's 20,000-Word Heroin Treatment Story Came Together | Washingtonian
